alert.note: Alert for Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 27 at 8:34AM CST until March 02 at 5:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Noxubee River At Macon affecting Noxubee County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Noxubee River At Macon. * WHEN...Until late Tuesday night. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CST Sunday the stage was 29.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 29.5 feet this afternoon. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Noxubee River Macon 26.0 29.4 Sun 8 am CST 28.5 26.5 23.5 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 845 PM CST.
